column4: Traffic;Kandal: An inspection of drivers entering Phnom Penh took

column1: place on 27.11.2019 from 9.00 to 11:00 am.------A roadblock was set up to check truck drivers for drug use
on National Rd 4 in Ampil village

column2: police found six men (11.8%) with traces of drugs in

column1: their system.------The six drivers were detained at the Kambol Police Inspectorate to make a case to send to the Phnom Penh Municipal Court.------Source: TNN TV (Facebook)
